entry.title: WIND WARNING , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 1:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
